name: PRE_AR_CHG_LVL_FO
description: Charge level filing order information. Note: temporary accounts receivable (TAR) records in Chronicles are purged periodically depending on your system setting. Be aware that old data in this table might be lost if you truncate the table.

columns.name: TAR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the subject record.

columns.name: CHG_LVL_FO_LINE
columns.description: Some charge lines may have charge line filing order.  This field allows for each charge line filing order to be unique.

columns.name: CHG_LVL_FO_CHG_LINE
columns.description: This item stores the line number for the charge procedure which corresponds to this charge level filing order line.

columns.name: CHG_LVL_FO_CVG_ID
columns.description: This item stores the charge level filing order coverage.

columns.name: CHG_LVL_FO_EXP_PMT
columns.description: This item stores the charge level filing order expected payment.

columns.name: CHG_LVL_FO_WO_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the charge level filing order write-off amount.
